action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a plate of food consisting of a piece of grilled chicken, a serving of what appears to be roasted potatoes, and a portion of steamed broccoli. The plate is placed on a table with a beige tablecloth, and there is a fork and knife to the right of the plate. The food is presented on a white plate with a blue rim.

DESCRIPTION: A plate of food with a piece of steak, roasted potatoes, and a side of vegetables including broccoli and carrots. There is also a wedge of lemon on the plate.

The plate is placed on a table with a beige tablecloth, and there is a fork and knife to the right of the plate. The food is presented on a white plate with a blue rim.

QUESTION: Is there any citrus fruit on the plate in your image?

QUESTION: What type of meat is on the plate in your image?
